subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ryan Whitney had two goals and Kris Letang scored the winner with 3 minutes 39 seconds to play as the Pittsburgh Penguins handed the visiting Islanders their sixth consecutive loss, 3-2, Thursday night.
snippet: Ryan Whitney had two goals and Kris Letang scored the winner with 3 minutes 39 seconds to play as the Pittsburgh Penguins handed the visiting Islanders their sixth consecutive loss, 3-2, Thursday night.
